conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (estoppel);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 8;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF VASILESCU v. ROMANIA - [Albanian Translation]
